definition: to change (to final stretch of journey)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: At 8 o 'clock in the morning, I'd like to take the plane diverted to the next station dubai.
sentences.chinese: 早上八点钟，我要搭飞机转往下一站迪拜了。

sentences.english: Thus many Iranians who can't make it to the West head to Dubai instead.
sentences.chinese: 因此，许多去不了西方国家的伊朗人转往迪拜。

sentences.english: Ibrahim moved his operation to Pakistan after the attacks.
sentences.chinese: 攻击之后，易卜拉希姆将他的公司转往巴基斯坦。

sentences.english: Maybe he meant he was turning in another direction now.
sentences.chinese: 也许他的意思是现在他要转往其它方向。

definition: to turn back/to retrace one's steps
roll over on side/turn half over
to pass (sth) on (to sb else)/to transfer sb (to another hospital etc)
Pitou township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
to return/to go back/to come back
